text:

text: 예약해서 갔는데 메뉴도 빨리나오고 친절하시고 매장청결상태도 좋았습니다. 다음에 재방문해서 다른메뉴도 먹어보고 싶습니다!
trans_text: I made a reservation, and the menu came out quickly, and the store was clean. I'd like to revisit and try other menus next time!

text: 남자친구 생일이라 좋은곳에서 밥먹고 싶었는데 잘 발견한거 같아요 ㅎㅎ 인테리어 깔끔하고 직원분들도 친절하시고 음식도 맛있었어요 모듬 샐러드로 각 종류 샐러드 다 맛 볼 수 있는게 좋더라구요

text:

text: 음식두 맛있구 직원분들도 친절하세요!! 그리고 분위기가 좋아서인지 커플들이 많이 있는 것 같더라구요ㅎㅎ 예약하고 오면 웨이팅 없이 바로 들어갈 수 있어서 편하구요! 행복한 저녁 보내고 갑니당~

text:
메뉴가 싱겁거나 짜지 않아서 좋아요
크림리조또도 많이 느끼하지않아서
먹기에 좋고 봉골레 파스타도 간이 쎄지 않고
봉골레도 많이 들어있어 맛있어용

추천추천
trans_text: I like the menu because it's not bland or salty. Cream risotto isn't that greasy either. It's good to eat and vongole pasta is not salty. There's a lot of vongole in it, so it's good. Salad is definitely..It's so delicious. The vegetables are in great condition, too! I think it would be good to come with a couple family and friends. Recommendation, recommendation

담에 재방문 할듯합니다.
trans_text: I had a meeting with my friends. It's Saturday, but I ate quietly and deliciouslyThe person receiving the order is kind~~*. I think I'll revisit it later.

text: 친절하시고 매장도 깔끔해요. 천장이 높아서 좋았어요 :) 파스타도 샐러드도 맛있고 가격도 착한 편이에요!
trans_text: They are kind and the store is clean. I liked the high ceiling :) Pasta and salad are delicious and the price is good!

text:
친구가 평소에 가보고 싶은 맛집을 저장해놓는 스타일인데 제가 서울숲에서 만나자고 했더니 여기 가자고 하더라구요!?
친구가 맛집을 잘 알아서 항상 믿고 가는데 오늘도 역시나 틀리지 않았네요ㅎㅎ 음식도 너무 맛있고 매장도 깔끔하구 테이블마다 귀여운 산타란 트리 모형까지ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 조명도 딱 예쁜 조명이예요! 엄청 밝지도 않고 그렇다고 어둡지는 않은데ㅋㅋㅋㅋ데이트 장소로도 딱이예요 파스타 소스가 중간에 부족해서 소스만 더 부탁드리니 거의 새것처럼 예쁘게 다시 가져다 주셔서 친절함에 감동했어용ㅠㅠ 너무 맛있었어용?그리고 샐러드도 신선했어용ㅋㅋㅋㅋ토마토 먹는데 딱 느껴졌어용ㅎㅎ 나중에 또 올거예용!
trans_text: My friend usually stores the restaurants he wants to visit, but I asked him to meet me in Seoul Forest, and he asked me to go here! ?. My friend knows good restaurants, so I always trust them, but as always, I didn't make a mistake todayThe food is so delicious, the store is clean, and every table has a cute Santa tree model[Laughing] The lighting is perfect, too! It's not that bright and it's not dark, but it's perfect for a date place I asked for more sauce because there was not enough pasta sauce in the middle, and I was moved by the kindness of bringing it back pretty as if it was new. ? And the salad was also fresh. I felt it when I ate the tomato. I'll come back later!

text: 직원들도 친절하시고 깔끔하게 맛있어요~~♡
trans_text: The staff are kind and clean. It's delicious~~♡

text: 블로그 보구 찾아왔는데 잘 온 것 같네요. 고기도 맛있구 직원분들도 친절하시고 좋아요.
trans_text: I came here after reading the blog, but I think you came well. The meat is good and the staff are kind and nice.

text: 직원분들도 친절하고 음식도 맛있어요 다른 곳보다 테이블이 넓어서 좋습니다
trans_text: The staff are kind and the food is good. It's nice that the table is bigger than other places

text: 연어샐러드, 해물오일파스타, 토시살스테이크 시켜 목었는데 넘 맛나네요. 미듐레어로 익혀나왔는데, 제가 한덩이만 살짝 더 익혀달라고 하니 친절하게 익혀주셨네요. 레어 먹기 히든 분들은 미듐으로 구어달라고 하면 맛나게 먹을 수 있을꺼 같아요.
trans_text: I ordered salmon salad, seafood oil pasta, and toshsal steak, but it tastes so good. It's cooked with a medium rare, but you kindly cooked it when I asked you to cook it a little more. For those who are eating rare, if you ask them to grill it with medium, I think they can enjoy it.

text: 별로에요  아이랑갔다가 무시받는 느낌이였습니다 예약석도 아니면서.... 다른곳앉으라하고 뒤에오는 커플은 앉게하고 음식에 이물질 나와도  사과는 커녕 다시주면 땡인가요? 아이랑와서 큰소리 안내고 나왔는데 계산할때도 사과도 없더라고요 다신 안가고싶어요
trans_text: I didn't like it. I felt like I was being ignored when I went with my kid It's not a reserved seat... I told them to sit somewhere else and let the couple behind me sit down, and even if there are foreign substances in the food, would it be wrong to give them again, let alone apologize? I came with my child and came out without making a big deal, but there was no apology when I paid. I don't want to go again

trans_text: It was really good. I'm a doctor who will revisit. The staff are so kind!!! . I'm touched by the kindness and taste of the staff. I'm leaving a review. First of all, the steak was really good. Even though it was cheap. The taste and baking were all great! The sauce came out separately, so it was the best for me who likes to eat it without sauce. It was good that shrimp was really plump and used high-quality ingredients. This taste! Compared to the surrounding commercial area, it was a reasonable price and cost-effectiveness. My friends complimented me throughout the meal. Next time, I'm going to eat tomato risotto and rose pasta again Haha

text: 직원분도 친절하시고. 음식도 맛있었어요

text:
예약하려고 전화하니깐 웨이팅 바로 없이 먹을 수 있다고 해서 갔는데 앞에 두팀있어서 밖에서 쌀쌀한 날씨에 꽤 기다렸네요. 더욱이 웨이팅 의자도 없고 주변에 둘러볼 곳도 없이 기다렸는데 솔직히 좀 기분이 안좋았어요. 식사 테이블이 카페 테이블 갔다 놓은 거 마냥 낮아서 불편하고.. 기본적인 피클도 달라해야 주시는 데 두번 말해때까지 안주시고 서비스가
별로였어요. 음식도 가격에 비해 맛있는 편은 아니라 재방문 의사는 없습니다.
trans_text: When I called to make a reservation, I heard that I could eat without waiting, but there were two teams in front of me, so I waited a long time outside in the chilly weather. Moreover, there were no waiting chairs and no places to look around, but honestly, I felt a little bad. It's uncomfortable because the dining table is as low as the cafe table.. They give me basic pickles if I ask for them, but they don't give me until I tell them twice. It wasn't that good. The food isn't that good for the price, but I'm not willing to revisit it.

text:
성수동 파스타집들 가격이 넘 비싸서 가격 괜찮고 찾아기기쉽고 분위기 좋은 곳 검색하다 발견했습니다??2인임에도 6인석 넓은 테이블 쓸 수 있게 해주셔서 편하게 식사할 수 있었네요! 맛있었구요! 다만 파스타 소스 양이 적어서 마지막엔 좀 꾸덕꾸덕하게 먹었는데요ㅎㅎ담에 또 방문하게되면 그 땐 소스 좀 더 달라고 부탁드려도 될지요??
직원분들 친절하시고 조용한 분위기에서 맛있게 식사했습니당! 찹스테이크 저렴한데 양많아서 좋았네요??
trans_text: I found the pasta restaurants in Seongsu-dong while searching for places that are affordable, easy to find, and have a good atmosphereI was able to eat comfortably because they allowed me to use a large table for 6 people even though I was a ??2 person! It was good! But the pasta sauce wasn't enough, so it was a bit thick at the endIf I visit again in the future, can I ask for more sauce??. The staff were kind and I enjoyed the meal in a quiet atmosphere! Chop steak is cheap, but it was good because there was a lot??
